BrigDialogue: ^BRIG: Hello there! Hope the festival is treating you well so far.
^CIELLE: Thank you! Oh- what are all these jars?
^COSMO: Wow! What the heck is in them!? They look so vibrant...
^BRIG: Why thank you! These are elixirs only found and cultivated by the Pluvian people here at this market!
TheRest: ^BRIG: No no, they are for medicinal purposes.
^COSMO: So all these different elixirs do different things!?
^BRIG: Pretty much! I am the one who sells them, but our biochemist Ceya is the one who makes them.
^COSMO: How are they made!? It sounds pretty complex...
^BRIGL Walk through the market towards the Pluvian Temple, I’m sure you’ll find more answers there from our Elder.
^CIELLE: Temple, huh... Thanks for the tip!
